com.cloudera.oryx.common.math

Class MatrixUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudera.oryx.common.math.MatrixUtils

  • public final class MatrixUtils
extends Object
    Contains utility methods for dealing with matrices, which are here represented as LongObjectMaps of LongFloatMaps, or of float[].
    Author:
    Sean Owen
